title: Video of a ragging incident in Sri Lanka falsely shared as ‘Muslim sisters harassed by RSS members in India’
subtitle: An Old video of a ragging incident in Sri Lanka is falsely shared as ‘Muslim sisters harassed by RSS members in India’.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video of a few men pouring water at burqa-clad women is making rounds on social media with a claim that Muslim sisters are being harassed by RSS members in India. But FACTLY has found the video to be not related to India. It shows a ragging incident that took place at a Sri Lankan university. FACTLY has already debunked the video last year when it went viral with a similar claim in Telugu.

Did you watch our new video?
